entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
